text: @jeremycorbyn @donwendyagain Suffering w/ #anxiety #mentalhealth #depression as a result of #covid19 #coronavirus? You are not alone! Check out this Dashboard Report on whats happening to others just like you, & feel free to take the survey yourself to see how you measure to others! https://t.co/VsvjLnhQFy
